    • onDeleteButtonClick

      public void onDeleteButtonClick(int movieId) throws SQLException
      It deletes a movie from the database. It checks if the movie is linked to a session and if the user wants to delete it. If the user confirms, the movie is deleted.
      Specified by:

    • createValidPath

      public String createValidPath(String imagePath)
      It creates a valid path by checking if the path starts with "file:". This is necessary for the image to be displayed in the view. If the path does not start with "file:", it adds it.
      Parameters:
      imagePath -
      Returns:
